Name: Provision of sanitary toilet seat covers in public primary and secondary schools.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of sanitary toilet seat covers in public primary and secondary schools.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Health
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1. Chapter one of title 17 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 17-193 to read as follows:
§17-193  Sanitary toilet seat covers in schools. The department of education shall ensure that sanitary toilet seat covers are provided to all primary and secondary schools within its jurisdiction in quantities sufficient to adequately supply each such school’s toilets.
	§ 2. This local law shall take effect one hundred and eighty days after enactment.





MEA
LS 5051
4/25/08
